description:
Montreal, Jan. 21, 2013 - Python developer Rory Geoghegan continues his presentation of itertools -- a Python module which implements a number of iterator building blocks inspired by constructs from APL, Haskell, and SML.

Useful links:
* Previous video: itertools, Part 1: http://youtu.be/VxPoJbpqAzI
* itertools: http://docs.python.org/2/library/itertools.html
* Rory: ca.linkedin.com/pub/rory-geoghegan/4/372/499
* MP34: http://montrealpython.org/2013/01/mp34/
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Module of the Month: itertools, Part 2 #MP34
